summary: A spell to summon the Shade of Barbas.
descriptionHtml:
Steam Workshop Mod Link: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=91440470

This is a mod that will allow you to summon a \'Shade\' of the dog Barbas from \'A Daedra\'s Best Friend\'.
This is a spell that is given upon completing \'A Daedra\'s Best Friend\', and will summon a ghostly apparition of Barbas to fight alongside you.
This is given only if you choose to complete the quest by sparing Barbas.
Unlike previous versions, this one should work. I was stupid and didn\'t archive the script that added the spell to the player into a .bsa originally.
author: Elliot
